translation: Giving themselves over to immeasurable cares that end only with death, regarding the gratification of lust as their highest aim, and feeling sure that that is all.
commentary: 16.11 worry cares? immeasurable immeasurable? f and? Pralayaantam ending only with death? Upashritah refuged in? Kamopabhogaparamas regarding gratification of lust as their highest aim? So much that is all? It is thus? certain feeling sure.Commentary They are beset with immense cares? worries and anxieties and their minds are engrossed in aciring and preserving the countless sensual objects. They have got
